h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 4 Secret Area
h2_title: How to Find the Venom Daoist
content: From here, go right and continue following the path lined with spider sacs. As you reach the other side, you'll see a large white sac in the middle.

The content is as follows:
From here, go right and continue following the path lined with spider sacs. As you reach the other side, you'll see a large white sac in the middle.
